thread.title: Every J. Cole Release To Go Gold Or Platinum
thread.title_full: Every J. Cole Release To Go Gold Or Platinum

author: Trevor Smith
title: Every J. Cole Release To Go Gold Or Platinum

organizations.name: ethan miller/getty images for clear channel  power trip

text:
Home > Music > Every J. Cole Release To Go Gold Or Platinum Every J. Cole Release To Go Gold Or Platinum 0 0 Posted by Trevor Smith  44pm With or without features. 
If you know anything about J. Cole , you know he's the man who went (double) platinum with no features. While its 2014 Forest Hills Drive (and his many stans) that gave him that unshakable title, Cole has quite a few other plaques under his belt. Today, we're going back through his various gold and platinum singles and albums, which range from his debut album all the way up to his recently released 4 Your Eyez Only project.Click through the galleries to see all the RIAA certifications Cole has earned so far, and be prepared for the rapper to continue to collect plaques as his (very featureless) new album does numbers throughout 2017. < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Jan 16, 2017 at 05:44pm 12 Views

4 Your Eyez Only (2016) RIAA Certification: Gold Certification Date: January 11, 2017 Billboard 200 Peak: 1 (Debut) Number of Features: 0 
Iovine sheds insight on Apple Music's plan to expand its content offerings. With or without features. 
If you know anything about J. Cole , you know he's the man who went (double) platinum with no features. While its 2014 Forest Hills Drive (and his many stans) that gave him that unshakable title, Cole has quite a few other plaques under his belt. Today, we're going back through his various gold and platinum singles and albums, which range from his debut album all the way up to his recently released 4 Your Eyez Only project.Click through the galleries to see all the RIAA certifications Cole has earned so far, and be prepared for the rapper to continue to collect plaques as his (very featureless) new album does numbers throughout 2017.
